attributes.action: No wonder teenagers are obese. Everytime we go to the park to play football the council took our goal posts! Sign to keep them during summer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ever notice how local councils remove goal posts from football pitches during the summer? No wonder teenagers are obese evertime they go to play football the goal posts are gone. Does it make sense to remove outdoor facilities during the time of year you can actually enjoy the weather! Sign to show support :-)

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
